channel.title: How do i make it so only certain names can equip certain stuff? and
channel.description:
ok so i want to make it so only the names pwnage and ownage can equip a whip. how would i do that?
also i am looking for a server restarter that restarts like every hour or every 30 mins. and is there any possible way to make that so it doesnt kill the server?

item.title: How do i make it so only certain names can equip certain stuff? and
item.dc:creator: @trevor268 trevor268
item.description:
@trevor268 wrote:

ok and where would i find stat requirements at to add this xd

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make it so only certain names can equip certain stuff? and
item.dc:creator: @runegay runegay
item.description:
@runegay wrote:

[quote=“I_nubnub_I, post:11, topic:180795”][quote author=runegay link=topic=242148.msg2048227#msg2048227 date=1202796640]
no it would be

If playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4151 && !!playerName.equalsIgnorecase("pwnage || Ownage");
{
sendMessage("have a cookie");
}else{
removeEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4151
}

[/quote]

No, note the !! at the beginning of the names…
Wich means:
If it doesn’t[/quote]
it wont unequip if the name is ownage, thats what the }else{ is for

if (playerName.equalsIgnorecase("Ownage")){
If (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4151){

sendMessage("have a cookie");
}else{
removeEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4151
}
}

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make it so only certain names can equip certain stuff? and
item.dc:creator: @madgamer madgamer
item.description:
@madgamer wrote:

[quote=“runegay, post:10, topic:180795”]no it would be

[code]
If playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4151 && !!playerName.equalsIgnorecase(“pwnage || Ownage”);
{
sendMessage(“have a cookie”);
}else{
removeEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4151
}

[/code][/quote]

2 problems with this

  1. double ‘!’
  2. it would unequip the whip if the persons name IS ownage/pwnage

item.title: How do i make it so only certain names can equip certain stuff? and
item.dc:creator: @I_nubnub_I I_nubnub_I
item.description:
@I_nubnub_I wrote:

If playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4151 && !!playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“pwnage”) || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Ownage”)
{
sendMessage(“have a cookie”);
removeEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4151
}

I hope thisone works

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make it so only certain names can equip certain stuff? and

item.title: How do i make it so only certain names can equip certain stuff? and
item.dc:creator: @madgamer madgamer
item.description:
@madgamer wrote:

add these with your other item equip requirements

int CLmem = GetCLmem;

if (CLmem == 0) { sendMessage("You do not have the rights to equip this item."); GoFalse = true; }

public int GetCLmem(int ItemID) { if ((ItemID == 4151) && (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("ownage") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("pwnage"))) { return 1; } return 0; }

Read full topic

I really had no idea anymore about what i used for my admin-only and members items :P[/quote]

also i am looking for a server restarter that restarts like every hour or every 30 mins. and is there any possible way to make that so it doesnt kill the server?[/quote]

Hmm, i’m doing this out of my head now, so don’t blame me when i’m wrong…

If playerWeapon == 4151 && !!playerName.equalsIgnorecase(“pwnage || Ownage”);
{
sendMessage(“have a cookie”);
removeWeapon(“4151”)
}

I almost know for shure this doesnt work properly… so don’t blame me…
I didn’t code for a while now…
